channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Vehicle vs Pedestrians; INC#1876; 11:00PM; 524 S Alvarado St; MAP: https://bit.ly/4d3ctg4; #Westlake; Three patients have been transported by LAFD Paramedics after being struck by a vehicle. All three are in critical condition. Unknown age/gender/condition/circumstances. LAPD Inc #5056. Nothing further.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E11 E211 EM11 FR11 RA11 RA13 RA20 T11; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1742; 09:30PM; 529 W 90th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UloeqW; #VermontVista; Firefighters responded to a property no longer occupied by the owner, where three structures are located: a front house, guest house (or "back house"), and a detached garage. Crews found heavy fire showing from the small guest house, adjacent to the detached garage. Firefighters advanced hose lines to the rear of the property and quickly applied water to the flames threatening the nearby garage. It took 24 firefighters 15 minutes to quench the flames, protecting the adjacent garage from all but minor exterior damage. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E233 E266 E33 E57 E64 RA264 RA57 RA857 RA864 SO1 T33 T66; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1742; 09:15PM; 537 W 89th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Q9V0bQ; #VermontVista; PRELIM: One-story "back house" with fire showing to the rear of a one-story single-family home. A nearby detached garage is threatened. Offensive mode.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E233 E266 E33 E57 E64 RA264 RA57 RA857 RA864 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0896; 01:08PM; 3184 Canyon Lake Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xzgIj9; #HollywoodHills; Firefighters are responding to an adult female hiker (approx 25 years old) with a lower extremity injury in a remote area of the Hollywood Hills. Rescuers on the ground have prepared her for a hoist and air transport. LAFD Air Ops will be performing a hoist operation and transporting her to a local hospital. Nothing further; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E76 H4 H6 HA4 HA6 RA97 RH114 T35; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0716; 11:54AM; 1507 S Robertson Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xFcZkn; #PicoRobertson; Firefighters responded to a structure fire in a one-story strip mall. The flames appeared to have originated in a utility closet inside the laundromat. Flames spread into the rest of the laundromat, but firefighters prevented it from burning into adjacent businesses (minor smoke/water damage affecting the adjacent businesses). Ultimately, it took 42 firefighters 21 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC11 BC4 BC5 BC9 CM20 CM22 CM722 E227 E229 E237 E26 E261 E29 E292 E3 E43 E58 E61 E68 E95 EA2 EM9 HR3 RA827 RA858 RA92 SO1 SQ95 T27 T29 T37 T61 T92 UR27 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0716; 11:33AM; 1507 S Robertson Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xFcZkn; #PicoRobertson; PRELIM: One-story strip mall with fire in the laundromat. Offensive mode.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC11 BC9 E261 E292 E43 E58 E68 RA858 RA92 SO1 T61 T92; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1777; 09:34PM; 3033 W Beverly Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3W2Rt30; #Westlake; One-story restaurant with fire showing. - Firefighters made access to the restaurant doing business as "Jim's Burgers" and quickly extinguished the flames in 14 minutes from the time of alarm (32 firefighters). No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC5 E11 E13 E211 E220 E6 RA11 RA20 RA811 T11 T20; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#1524; 06:36PM; 674 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JswP4F; #Downtown; Firefighters responded to a law enforcement bus that was transporting 13 men in custody. As a result of a traffic collision, at least 8 of them (all between the ages of 18 and 24) are being transported to a local hospital with minor injuries.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC11 E209 E211 EM11 RA810 RA811 RA834 RA858 RA894 RA9 T11; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1483; 06:33PM; 10312 N Norris Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/441ptPa; #Pacoima; Firefighters forced entry into the one-story commercial building to find smoke inside. As they investigated further, they located a fire inside, which had not yet spread to the structural members (contents fire only). Crews quickly deployed hose lines to extinguish the flames before they had more widely spread. It took 32 firefighters 20 minutes to respond, access, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR1 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E24 E274 E275 E289 E290 E298 E474 E75 E77 E81 E87 E89 E98 EM15 HR3 RA898 RA98 SO1 SQ87 T74 T75 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1483; 06:13PM; 10312 N Norris Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/441ptPa; #Pacoima; One-story commercial building with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 E24 E275 E298 E75 E77 E98 RA898 RA98 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange
